name: Calamity, A Text-Based Adventure Game
description:
Title: Calamity, A Text-Based Adventure Game

Platform: PC

Genre: Text Adventure, Horror, Action

Rating: E10

Target Market: 10+, Casual Players

Game Overview: Have you ever wondered what choices you would make if the zombie apocalypse ever occurred? How about an alien invasion? Or even meeting your favorite horror movie antagonist in the real world? Well in Calamity you can experience all of these things and more, as well as a few others, where your decisions will have an impact on whether or not you escape these events, or if it becomes "Game Over".

Instructions: Click the Fullscreen button in the bottom right of the screen and then click the blue choices as you deem necessary for your adventure.

Game Design Team:

Alexander DuPre - Game Designer
